docs.lead_paragraph: Thousands of opponents of the health care legislation circled the Capitol on Saturday waving signs and chanting slogans.

headline.main: Spitting and Slurs Directed at Lawmakers

docs.abstract: Outside the Capitol, several House members said there was an ugly tone to comments made by some demonstrators against three black lawmakers.
docs.snippet: Outside the Capitol, several House members said there was an ugly tone to comments made by some demonstrators against three black lawmakers.

docs.lead_paragraph: At a rally at the Capitol, President Obama told Democratic lawmakers not to pass the health care bill for him: "Don't do it for the Democratic party. Do it for the American people." (Video: MSNBC)

headline.main: Obama: Pass Bill for the American People
headline.sub: Obama's Health Speech on Capitol Hill

docs.snippet: At a rally at the Capitol, President Obama told Democratic lawmakers not to pass the health care bill for him: "Don't do it for the Democratic party. Do it for the American people." (Video: MSNBC)

docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama, in an extraordinary session with the Democratic caucus just a day before a climactic vote on major health care legislation, made a forceful case for health care reform on both policy and political grounds.

headline.main: Obama Forcefully Makes Case at Capitol

docs.abstract: Mr. Obama, in an extraordinary session with the Democratic caucus on Saturday, made a forceful case for the healh care legislation both on policy and political grounds.
docs.snippet: Mr. Obama, in an extraordinary session with the Democratic caucus on Saturday, made a forceful case for the healh care legislation both on policy and political grounds.

byline.original: By DAVID M. HERSZENHORN and CARL HULSE

docs.lead_paragraph: When is the Medicare payroll tax not the Medicare payroll tax? When it's the "unearned income Medicare contribution," of course.

headline.main: A New Name for a Payroll Tax

docs.abstract: A payroll tax that now applies to "unearned income."
docs.snippet: A payroll tax that now applies to "unearned income."

docs.lead_paragraph: White House officials and House Democratic leaders worked furiously on Saturday to secure the votes needed to pass landmark health care legislation, with the outcome riding on a small group of lawmakers who want the bill to include tighter limits on insurance coverage for abortions.

headline.main: As Rules Committee Meets, Democrats Scramble for Votes

docs.abstract: As Sunday's vote neared, Democrats struggled to resolve disagreements over abortion coverage in the health care legislation.
docs.snippet: As Sunday's vote neared, Democrats struggled to resolve disagreements over abortion coverage in the health care legislation.

docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama is telephoning individual Democrats to ask for their support of the major health care legislation in advance of his planned visit to Capitol Hill on Saturday afternoon, the White House said.
docs.abstract: The White House brings the full-court press to Capitol Hill.
docs.snippet: The White House brings the full-court press to Capitol Hill.

docs.lead_paragraph: Democrats now appear to be within 10 votes of the 216 they will need to pass major health care legislation.
docs.abstract: Three House Democrats who had been wavering announce their support for major health care legislation.
docs.snippet: Three House Democrats who had been wavering announce their support for major health care legislation.

docs.lead_paragraph: Representative Bart Stupak, Democrat of Michigan and a leader of the Congressional Pro-Life Caucus, has postponed a news conference that had been scheduled for 11 a.m. on Saturday, a sign that there is still serious maneuvering under way in the fight over abortion language in the major health care legislation.
docs.abstract: The House's leading abortion opponent postpones a news conference on Saturday, a sign that negotiations are still under way.
docs.snippet: The House's leading abortion opponent postpones a news conference on Saturday, a sign that negotiations are still under way.

docs.lead_paragraph: Monologue | Friday night on "Late Night With Jimmy Fallon" on NBC: You guys enjoying March Madness? I am so pumped for this weekend. My friends are coming over. We're going to pound some beers, paint our faces, and watch the healthcare vote go down on C-SPAN. Yeah!
docs.abstract: Monologue | Friday night on "Late Night With Jimmy Fallon" on NBC: You guys enjoying March Madness? I am so pumped for this weekend. My friends are coming over. We're going to pound some beers, paint our faces, and watch the healthcare vote go down on C-SPAN. Yeah!
docs.snippet: Monologue | Friday night on "Late Night With Jimmy Fallon" on NBC: You guys enjoying March Madness? I am so pumped for this weekend. My friends are coming over. We're going to pound some beers, paint our faces, and watch the healthcare vote go down...
